meanings.definition: Smooth and glossy in texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The car had the sleekiest paint job, shining in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The sleekiest marble countertop added a touch of luxury to the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The sleekiest phone cover made the device look like a polished gem.
meanings.sent4: Her sleekiest hair flowed down her back like a silk curtain.
meanings.sent5: The sleekiest silk dress hugged her figure elegantly.

meanings.definition: Having an attractive and stylish design.
meanings.sent1: The sleekiest sports car turned heads as it sped by.
meanings.sent2: The sleekiest furniture in the showroom was quickly sold out.
meanings.sent3: She wore the sleekiest outfit to the party, outshining everyone.
meanings.sent4: The sleekiest watch on his wrist caught the light with every movement.
meanings.sent5: The sleekiest sunglasses completed her chic look.

meanings.sent1: The sleekiest yacht in the harbor belonged to a famous movie star.
meanings.sent2: The sleekiest hotel in town was known for its impeccable service.
meanings.sent3: His sleekiest manners charmed everyone he met.
meanings.sent4: The sleekiest ballroom dance showcased their grace and poise.
meanings.sent5: The sleekiest event of the year was attended by all the socialites.
